mapper.insert: INSERT INTO todos (user_idx, title, description, completed) VALUES (#{userIdx}, #{title}, #{description}, #{completed})
mapper.select: SELECT T.user_idx AS userIdx, T.title, T.description, T.completed, T.todos_idx AS todosIdx, U.user_id AS userId, U.email FROM todos T INNER JOIN users U ON T.user_idx = U.user_idx WHERE T.user_idx = #{userIdx}
SELECT T.title, T.description, T.completed, U.user_id AS userId, U.email FROM todos T INNER JOIN users U ON T.user_idx = U.user_idx WHERE T.todos_idx = #{todosIdx}

SELECT T.user_idx AS userIdx, T.title, T.description, T.completed, T.todos_idx AS todosIdx, U.user_id AS userId, U.email FROM todos T INNER JOIN users U ON T.user_idx = U.user_idx WHERE T.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
